trans-southport-v1.dc:title: South Port Transportation Model
trans-southport-v1.dc:description: Transportation network that includes a simple model of roadways and seaways at SouthPort, PEV

transportation-network-gate-exp1.dc:title: South Port Transportation Model
transportation-network-gate-exp1.dc:description: Transportation network that includes a simple model of roadways and seaways at SouthPort, PEV

transportation-network-gate-disrupt-exp1.dc:title: South Port Transportation Model
transportation-network-gate-disrupt-exp1.dc:description: Transportation network with delay at FIT Gate (1500m holding time default)

transportation-network-gate-exp1v2.dc:title: South Port Transportation Model
transportation-network-gate-exp1v2.dc:description: Transportation network that includes a simple model of roadways and seaways at SouthPort, PEV

transportation-network-gate-disrupt-exp1.dc:title: South Port Transportation Model
transportation-network-gate-disrupt-exp1.dc:description: Transportation network but switch to disrupt Crowley Gate (720m holding time default)

cyber-crowley-v1.dc:title: Crowley Cyber Model
cyber-crowley-v1.dc:description: A communications network for Crowley that includes a Terminal Operating System, Gate Operating System, and Gate Kiosks.

cyber-crowley-vKali1.dc:title: Attacker perspective of Crowley Cyber Model
cyber-crowley-vKali1.dc:description: A perspective of communications network for Crowley from attacker perspective.  Could be output of an nmap scan.

trans-cyber-v1.dc:title: PEV Transportation-Cyber Dependencies
trans-cyber-v1.dc:description: Dependencies between the South Port transportation model and the Crowley cyber operations.

trans-cyber-v2.dc:title: PEV Transportation-Cyber Dependencies (v2)
trans-cyber-v2.dc:description: Dependencies between the South Port transportation model and the Crowley cyber operations.

trans-cyber-exp1.dc:title: PEV Transportation-Cyber Dependencies (v2)
trans-cyber-exp1.dc:description: Dependencies between FIT Gate and Cyber Operations.

trans-cyber-exp1v2.dc:title: PEV Transportation-Cyber Dependencies (v2)
trans-cyber-exp1v2.dc:description: Dependencies between Crowley Gate and Cyber Operations.

southport-vessels-may2017-v1.dc:title: Southport Vessels May 2017
southport-vessels-may2017-v1.dc:description: Vessels coming to Southport, PEV. Based on Vessel Schedules from PEV as well as PIERS Bills of Lading Data. (imports only, zip archive)

schedule-exp1v2a.dc:title: Crowley Vessels May 2017
schedule-exp1v2a.dc:description: Vessels coming to Southport, PEV.  Shipment files have destination set to 'McIntosh Intersection', but vessels have a shipper of Crowley in isolation (08:00-17:00 workday)

schedule-exp1v2b.dc:title: Crowley Vessels May 2017
schedule-exp1v2b.dc:description: Vessels coming to Southport, PEV.  Shipment files have destination set to 'McIntosh Intersection', but vessels have a shipper of Crowley in isolation (08:00-20:00 workday)
